This should work without importing the Views Plug-in shouldn' it?

You shouldn't have to import anything if this is your development image that you
are talking about.

Moving to Platform/UI for comment.

Build I20040210

The following plugins are included:

org.eclipse.core.runtime

It is because you don't have views loaded. We should check for this and not 
include the button if not.
